featured.text: Such demand increased with the rise of western movies, and many cowboys with masterful skills on horseback found a new 27 as a stunt person.

definition.zh_def: 牛仔；在美國西部從事牧牛工作的男性或女性，通常穿著特定的服裝。
definition.en_def: A person, especially in the western United States, who herds and tends cattle, typically on horseback and often wearing a wide-brimmed hat and boots.
definition.example: The cowboy rode his horse across the open plains.
